full_summary:
## Tender Announcement for Harbour Maintenance Dredging of Cap-Des-Rosiers

**Reference Number:** WS4091451842-Doc4091685691
**Publication Date:** July 10, 2023
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** August 17, 2023, 14:00:00

### Tender Overview
**Title (English/French):** EE519-240477 - Dredging of Cap-Des-Rosiers Harbour / Dragage du havre de Cap-Des-Rosiers
**Tender Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contract Details

* **Services:** Dredging services for the harbour maintenance of Cap-Des-Rosiers, Gaspésie
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** None / December 31, 2023

### Evaluation Parameters

* The selection criteria for this contract is determined as the "Lowest Price" among all submitted tenders.

### Contracting Entity
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Minister of Public Works and Government Services, Gabriel Fortin-Harvey (email: [gabriel.fortin-harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gabriel.fortin-harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca))

### Notice and Attachments
[Notice URL in French and English](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16822457?extsite=MTY4MjI0NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Regions of Delivery
* Quebec (excluding NCR)

### Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
